title: InGround标签的用法
author: 别再卖萌了
txt_content: InGround标签的用法，比如要箭射到的地方爆炸

replies.author: pcktrsss
replies.txt_content:
inground就是箭是否落在地上
探测:
testfor @e[type=Arrow] {inGround:1b}
如果要生成爆炸，请先添加记分:
scoreboard objectives add arrowinground dummy
一个高频命令方块
scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] arrowinground 1 {inGround:1b}
接连锁
execute @e[type=Arrow,score_arrowinground_min=1] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0}
接连锁
kill @e[type=Arrow,score_arrowinground_min=1]
防止箭一直爆炸

有些地方单词拼写可能有误，毕竟没用电脑

replies.author: pcktrsss
replies.txt_content: 如果想要具体探测箭射在什么方块上了，请用inTile和inData
